106 def create(dir_path, test_dict, bb_start, bb_size):
107 
108  filepath = os.path.join(dir_path, test_dict["img"])
109  print(filepath)
110  img = cv.imread(filepath)
111  print(img)
112  _, grid = detect_contour2(img, (3,3), bb_size, bb_start)
113  truth_arr = np.vstack(test_dict["truth"])
114  colorsCheck = inRange(np.array(grid), truth_arr[:, 1], truth_arr[:, 0])
115  print("grid: ", grid)
116  print("truth_arr: ", truth_arr)
117  print("colorsCheck", colorsCheck)
118  return np.all(colorsCheck)
119 
120 def inRange(src, upper, lower):
121  return np.logical_and(np.greater_equal(src, lower), np.less_equal(src, upper))
122
